summary: Completed comprehensive testing of NSTU Property Tax Manager feature update. All backend APIs (11/11 tests passed) and frontend UI changes verified successfully. Key features tested: Admin login (nastu123), Dashboard UI changes (Completed Colony, 5 stat cards), Role-based access (SUPERVISOR full access, MC_OFFICER limited), Attendance system, Survey form changes (locked fields, updated relations, self-satisfied, removed old_property_id, 50m radius check).
passed_tests: Admin login with admin/nastu123 credentials
Dashboard shows 'Completed Colony' (renamed from 'Today Completed Wards')
Dashboard has 5 stat cards (Total, Completed, Pending, Rejected, Employees) - Batches removed
Admin can access all pages (Employees, Upload Data, Properties, Map, Submissions, Export)
SUPERVISOR user creation and login works
SUPERVISOR has full admin access (all navigation items visible)
MC_OFFICER user creation and login works
MC_OFFICER has limited navigation (no Employees, Upload Data, Export)
MC_OFFICER can access Dashboard, Properties, Map, Submissions
Attendance API: GET /api/employee/attendance/today returns status
Attendance API: POST /api/employee/attendance works with selfie upload
Admin can view attendance records via /api/admin/attendance
Employee dashboard shows attendance status card
Attendance page shows marked status with selfie and GPS
Survey form shows 'PROPERTY DATA (READ ONLY)' section with locked fields
Survey form locked fields: Property ID, Owner, Mobile, Colony, Total Area, Amount, Latitude, Longitude
Survey form has updated Relation dropdown: Self, Family Member, Tenant, Neighbour, Other
Survey form has 'Self Satisfied?' Yes/No radio buttons
Survey form has editable 'Ward Number' field
Survey form does NOT have 'Old Property ID' input field (correctly removed)
50m radius check: 'Move Closer to Submit' button shown when GPS not captured or too far
Employee progress API returns role field for each employee
seed_data_creation: Created test_supervisor_ui and test_mc_officer_ui users for role-based access testing (cleaned up after tests)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All major feature updates verified: (1) Dashboard UI - 'Completed Colony' label, 5 stat cards without Batches. (2) Role-based access - SUPERVISOR has full admin access, MC_OFFICER has limited view (no Employees, Upload Data, Export). (3) Attendance system - one-time daily selfie check-in working with GPS. (4) Survey form - locked property fields in gray box, updated relation options (Self, Family Member, Tenant, Neighbour, Other), Self Satisfied radio buttons, editable Ward Number, Old Property ID removed, 50m radius check shows 'Move Closer to Submit' when out of range.
